body: Design and implementation of compilers; lexical analysis, parsing, semantic actions, optimization, and code generation.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: CMPSC461)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: CMPSC 471: Introduction to Compiler Construction
